Text: "However, it commits the fatal flaw of a side project -- it sounds like one." FLAW!?! This one of the best albums, hands down, to come out of the so-called "Grunge" wave in the 90's. If you don't have it, grab it FFS. Layne Staley and McCready is at their best on this album.
...should of course be "ARE at their best", sorry.
I agree. If you like this kind of music, this album is a must-have. The baseline of the first track defies definition, and the rest of the track are top-notch too.
